landing.title: DuoDuel
landing.description: A psychological journey from strangers to deeply connected partners.
rules: Hit 'Like' (+1 point) if you enjoy the answer.
Hit 'Dislike' (-1 point) if the answer doesn't land.
Use your Boon (âœ¨) wisely to skip a question once without penalty.
Final settlement: The loser pays the difference to the winner.
